José es un humilde y trabajador campesino de 43 años de edad, dedicado a la actividad de la agricultura, distribuye sus productos en la plaza y todas sus ganancias son destinadas al mantenimiento de su hogar el cual lo conforman sus 3 hijos menores de edad y su pareja. 

José trabaja 7 horas diarias, su desea es pagar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y que uno de sus muchachos se haga parte de los cultivos y los use para el mantenimiento de la familia.

En el momento este hombre presenta una dificultad y es la falta de capital para abonar sus campos, está actividad es muy necesaria hacerla si se espera obtener cultivos sanos y abundantes y al ser la agricultura el único medio de sustento de su familia se ve en la necesidad de solicitar su apoyo para comprar abonos, riegos y pesticidas, ese apoyo se los quiere retribuir con cumplimiento en las cuotas pactadas y con éxito y mejoras en su negocio.
texts.en:
José is a humble and hard-working farmer.  He is 43-years old and works in agriculture.  He sells his produce in the main square, and all his earnings are used to support his household.   José's household consists of his three dependent children and his wife. 

José works seven hours a day.  His wants to pay for his children's education and to improve the conditions of his home.  He hopes that one of his boys will also work in agriculture to support the family. 

At this time, José is facing a difficulty.  He doesn't have enough capital to fertilize his fields.  It's very important that he fertilize the fields if he wants to have a healthy and abundant crop.  Agriculture is José's only means of supporting his family, which is why he needs some help to pay for compost, irrigation and pesticides.  He wants to show his gratitude for the loan by complying with the agreed upon payments and being successful and making improvements in his business.

loans.use: to pay for compost, irrigation and pesticides.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela es una mujer de 25 años de edad, responsable y comprometida con su familia. Es la orgullosa madre de dos hijos la mayor de 6 años y el menor con tan solo 2 meses de edad.

Marcela es la propietaria de una miscelánea, ofrece productos como chocolates, tarjetas conmemorativas, mugs, accesorios en acero, peluches globos, entre otros artículos para regalar a esa persona tan especial que cada ser tiene.

Aprendió sola de la actividad, la emplea porque gracias a que esta siempre en un punto puede poner cuidado a sus muchachos, pero necesita incrementar sus ventas, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de los artículos anteriormente mencionados.
texts.en:
25-year old Marcela is a responsible woman who is devoted to her family. She is the proud mother of two children, the older one aged 6 years and the younger only two months.

Marcela runs a store selling a variety of goods such as chocolates, birthday and other cards, mugs, metal accessories, stuffed toys, balloons and other gifts for the special person that everyone has.

She learned on the job. It is work that she can still do while caring for her children. However, she needs to increase sales so she is seeking a loan to buy more of the previously mentioned items.

loans.use: Buy stock such as chocolates, birthday and other cards, mugs, metal accessories, stuffed toys, and balloons

loans.name: Leninlimo-Tatale Benatabe Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and married with four children. Elizabeth lives in Benatabe in the Tatale-Sanguli district of Northern region of Ghana. Elizabeth is a member of a grain-processing group called "Leninlimo, Benatabe - Tatale". She is the woman pictured sitting in the middle of her groupmates with a hand raised in the photo.

The group has been in business for the past decade, and Elizabeth and all her groupmates have been trained to process quality beans and cereals for the home market. Elizabeth enjoys doing her business and hopes to grow the business with proceeds from her business. She and her group, Leninlimo, Benatabe-Tatale, have requested a loan of 22,700 cedis (GHC). Elizabeth’s portion of the loan is 1,000 GHC, which she will use to buy more grains for processing to meet local demand in order to grow her business. She also intends to diversify and sell provisions when the business is grown. 

Elizabeth hopes to repay this loan from the income she will make from her business. Elizabeth wants to provide her children with good food and clothing to make her family happy. She is grateful to Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: To buy more grains to meet local demand in order to grow her business.

loans.name: Marly Judith

texts.es:
Marlyn es una humilde mujer de 33 años de edad, que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para fortalecer su actividad de cultivo, su necesidad recae en la falta de recursos para darle un buen mantenimiento a sus cultivos para aprovechar en un 100% las cosechas.

Su principal deseo con el préstamo es mejorar las ganancias, para tener una calidad de vida digna. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como: abonos, riegos y fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Marly is a simple woman of 33 who is seeking a loan to strengthen her small farm. She needs to buy supplies for her fields so that she has an excellent harvest. Her main wish is to increase her income and have a better standard of living.

Marly will use the money to buy farming supplies such as compost, sprinklers, and fertilizer.

loans.use: buy farming supplies such as compost, sprinklers, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino lives in Akhasheni in eastern Georgia. Her husband died, so she raises her son alone. She earns a regular but small income as a shop assistant. Some extra money from her vineyard would improve their situation. But unfortunately, her vines are of an unpopular variety which winemakers do not want to buy.

This loan allows Nino to refurbish her old vineyard with new poles and wires and to hire workers for the heavy work. Then, she will buy and plant seedlings of the popular Rkatsiteli vine. That is a traditional variety in the region, which makes a tasty and saleable wine. She does not make the wine herself but sells the grapes to local winemakers, who have the appropriate equipment and experience.

loans.use: to refurbish her vineyard and plant a good grape variety in order to increase her income as a single mother.

loans.name: Jenelyn1 Group

texts.en:
Yolanda is the featured borrower of Jenelyn 1 Group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines. They came to work in Lebanon for a better income to support their beloved ones back in the Philippines.

Yolanda is a 43-year-old married mother of four children. She is working hard as a housekeeper to cover the expenses and needs of her beloved kids and to improve their living conditions. Thus, she is acquiring a loan to pay her children's school tuition fees. Yolanda is the first lady on the left.

With respect to the other group members, Karen is the first lady on the right and Grace is the lady standing in the middle.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Flordelisa

texts.en:
Flordelisa works hard to support her family. Flordelisa is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Flordelisa requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Flordelisa has been in this business for 20 years.

Flordelisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Leonila is 46 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Leonila has a buy and sell coconut business in the Philippines. Leonila requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more coconuts to sell to her customers.

Leonila has been in this business for 4 years. Leonila would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts to sell to her customers

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is 42 years old and married with five children. With five children currently in school, Luzviminda works very hard to provide for them.

Luzviminda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

Luzviminda has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, eggs, candies, biscuits, cereals, milk, etc. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Luzviminda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Marvie

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marvie works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling purchase order cards. Marvie is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Marvie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Al Amal 6 Group

texts.en:
Houwaida is the featured borrower for Al Amal 6 Group. She got together with the other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They work hard to develop their businesses and lives at the same time.

Houwaida is a 42-year-old married mother of three children. Ten years ago, she started working as a tailor from her house to help her husband in covering their family's needs and expenses. Houwaida is well-known in her region for her professional skills in this domain. She is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to buy an updated new tailoring machine which will facilitate her business and provide her customers with better service. She hopes to develop her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions. 

In the photo, Houwaida is on the right, Amal is in the middle and Mayada is on the left.

loans.use: to buy an updated new tailoring machine which will facilitate her business

loans.name: Rabih

texts.en:
Rabih is a 26-year-old married father of one child and a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. He works as a car mechanic to cover his family's needs and expenses. 

Rabih is well known in his region for his special talent and his prices, and he has succeeded throughout the years in gaining his own customers. He is always working hard to develop his business; thus, today he is acquiring a youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase his business merchandise with car spare parts to satisfy his customers' needs. 

Rabih hopes to keep on expanding his business in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions inside the camp.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise with car spare parts to satisfy his customers' needs

loans.name: Mogeni

texts.en:
Mogeni is age 54 years old. He has three children to support. He has been in business for the last 10 years, and the business has been earning him an income of 30,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). 

Mogeni has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to purchase animal feeds and add a dairy cow for milk production to sell to his clients. He plans to use the gained profit to repay his loan with the surplus to educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase animal feeds and add a dairy cow for milk production to sell to his clients.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a frozen foods vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fruit vending. Marilyn is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell for her frozen food vending business.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more packs of frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a married woman with eight children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Merlinda is 46 years old and has six children who are in school.

Merlinda has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines. Merlinda requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers.

Merlinda has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Merlinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia vive es casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes les garantiza una buena calidad de vida gracias a su negocio con el cual intenta generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente, junto con su compañero, para que en su hogar mejoren las condiciones económicas y puedan tener una vida plena. 

Desde hace 14 años comenzó con gran esfuerzo un negocio de venta de bolsos y venta de variedades en un local ubicado en el municipio de Itagui.

Debido a que sus clientes están aumentando y cada vez demandan más productos, Claudia busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de ropa y bolsos de nuevas tendencias para ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos en su negocio.

Con este préstamo la actividad de Claudia tendrá un gran impulso pues mejorara su inventario y sus ventas.
texts.en:
Claudia is married and has 2 children. She is able to guarantee her children a good quality of life with her business.  Through her work, she is able to generate income to contribute financially along her husband. They are able to improve their economic conditions and to have a full life.

14 years ago, she started her business selling handbags and varieties in a shop located in the town of Itagui.

Her customer base is growing and they are demanding more products every time. Claudia requests a loan to buy assortment of clothes and handbags of new trends. This will enable her to offer her customers greater variety of product in her shop.

With this loan, Claudia will have a great boost in inventory and sales.

loans.use: to buy assortment of clothes and handbags of new trends in order to offer her customers greater variety

loans.name: Mehnaz

texts.en:
Mehnaz, aged 41, lives with her five children and husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been selling fruits and vegetables for many years. He uses a four-wheel manual cart for selling. As a hawker, he can easily travel near people, who often prefer to buy fruits at their door instead of going to the market. Due to the fruits' freshness, he has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Due to his reputation, the demand for fruits has increased and by noon he has run out of stock.

Mehnaz feels proud of her husband and appreciates his efforts for the family. She is is receiving a loan for her husband so that he can buy fruits and vegetables in more quantities and an equilibrium scale to weigh. Mehnaz wants to save the excess profit for future sudden needs and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in quantity and an equilibrium scale for her husband's business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in an iron door, galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to change the roof and install a door to her house.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is 41 years old. He is married with five children. He has had a butcher shop for three years. He will be using this loan to buy more stock of meat to sell to his customers, hoping this will enable him to make more income to pay school fees for his children. His hopes and dreams for the future are to grow his business, make more income, educate his children, and improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy more stock of meat to sell to his customers, hoping this will enable him to make more income to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy, 27 years old, is married and has four school-going children. She has had a cereals business for the last seven years and the business gives her a good income. Mercy will be using the loan to purchase cereals, and she hopes this will help her pay school fees. Her hope and dream for the future is to have a better business.

loans.use: to purchase more cereals to help her pay school fees

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice, aged 45 years, is married and has four children. She lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Beatrice trades in cocoa, mainly buying and selling to agents and cocoa companies. She gets additional income from selling cassava flour and beans. Beatrice started the business to raise income for the family and school fees for the children. Beatrice's main challenge is limited capital. She hopes to expand the business, educate her children and support the family in getting basic needs. Beatrice has asked for a loan to buy rice and beans to sell to her customers.

loans.use: To buy rice and beans for resale.

loans.name: María Nubia

texts.es:
Maria, con 30 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos y responsable de su hogar junto con su esposo. 

Desde hace 11 años, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una sala de belleza que inició como alternativa para generar recursos que le permitieran velar por el bienestar de su familia, trabaja sola todos los días durante 10 horas, la actividad la aprendió tomando clases en una academia de belleza y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector por la calidad de su servicio. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar los diferentes utensilios e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, tinturas, shampoo, acondicionador, entre otros), así estará en la capacidad de prestar un mejor servicio, pues los clientes estarán más cómodos, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe. 

Maria con su perseverancia y proyección hacia un futuro, desea hacer crecer su salón de belleza, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo para madres cabezas de familia, dando como resultado un mejor bienestar no sólo para su familia, sino que aportará para que otras personas puedan disfrutar de mejores condiciones para vivir.
texts.en:
Maria, age 30, has three children. Together with her husband, she is responsible for her household. She has been working in her own business, a beauty salon, for 11 years. She started the business as a way to generate resources that would allow her to watch out for her family's well-being. She works alone every day for ten hours. She learned this business activity by taking classes at a beauty academy. Little by little she was gaining more knowledge and perfecting her techniques. This has allowed her to become well-known in the area for the quality of her service.

She is now requesting the support of the loan to provide better service and to make her customers more comfortable. This will help her to improve her sales and the earnings that she gets. With her perseverance and looking towards the future, she wishes to make her beauty salon grow so that she is able to generate more employment opportunities for mothers who are heads of their families. The result would be better well-being not only for her family, but it would also contribute to other people being able to enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy different utensils and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, dyes, shampoos, and conditioners, among others).

loans.name: Kosilanta

texts.en:
Kosilanta, aged 31 years, is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of five children. She lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Kosilanta trades in cocoa, mainly buying and selling to agents and cocoa companies. She gets additional income from selling cassava flour and rice in the markets. 

Kosilanta started the business to raise income for the family and school fees for the children. Her main challenge is limited capital. Kosilanta hopes to expand the business, educate her children and support the family in getting basic needs. Kosilanta has asked for a loan to buy rice to resell to her customers.

loans.use: To buy rice to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Margarita, una mujer de carácter y buena voluntad, con deseos de progresar y salir adelante con su familia.

Ella decidió por iniciar con un negocio de preparación y venta de arepas desde hace aproximadamente 7 años en un pequeño local con muchas ganas y empuje. 

Este oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, con la necesidad y el gusto por las ventas, esto le permitió obtener gran experiencia.

Hoy en día desea darle un pequeño impulso a su negocio con la ayuda de los prestadores de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar, por esta razón requiere un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas a su empresa.

Con este crédito podrá sostener su negocio y hacerlo crecer cada día más.

Es una mujer que asume retos y los enfrenta con valentía.
texts.en:
Margarita is a woman of character and good will. She wants to progress and get ahead with her family.

She decided to start a business about seven years ago, with great will and drive, making and selling arepas from a small shop.

She learned the trade on her own. The need and love for sales allowed her to get a great experience.

Today, she wants to give a boost to her business with the help of Kiva providers and Interact Corporation. Margarita requests a loan to make upgrades to her shop.

With this loan, she will be able to sustain her business and make it grow every day.

Margarita takes challenges and faces them with courage.

loans.use: to obtain capital to make upgrades to her shop

loans.name: Aun's Group

texts.en:
Aun, 25, is a married mother residing in Kampong Cham province with three dependent children. One of them is in school and the other two are too young for schooling. Aun has been growing rice as the main source of the family’s income for seven years. She also makes palm sugar for supplemental income. 

Aun's crop was destroyed by pests and it was not healthy enough to produce a good output. This is Aun’s first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she is leading a group of three members in applying for a loan to save her business. Her portion of the loan will be used to buy rice seeds and organic fertilizers to increase crop yields. She hopes she can get more yields so as to improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and organic fertilizers to increase crop yields.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 50 years old and married with seven children. With two children currently in school, Shirley works very hard to provide for them.

Shirley runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items such as snack foods, cooking oil, beers, soft drinks, eggs, coffee, etc., to sell.

Shirley has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, cooking oil, beers, soft drinks, eggs, coffee, etc. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Shirley would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items, such as snack foods, cooking oil, beers, soft drinks, eggs, coffee, etc., to sell

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Эту простую и надёжную девушку зовут Шахло. Она уроженка города Курган-Тюбе. Шахло замужем и живет со свекровью и свекром. Из-за финансовых проблем её муж уехал на заработки в другую страну. Сама Шахло занимается растениеводством. Она успевает работать по дому и одновременно заниматься этим делом. Сейчас она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения для обработки земли. В данный момент из-за кризиса муж Шахло не присылает ей достаточный средств, и её последняя надежда остается только на получение кредита. Шахло по настоящему нуждается в Вашей поддержке!
texts.en:
This modest and reliable young woman is Shahlo. She is a native of Qurgan-Tube city. Shahlo is married and lives with her in-laws. Because of financial difficulties, her husband went overseas to work. Shahlo herself cultivates crops. She manages her household and this business simultaneously. 

Now she has applied for a loan to buy mineral fertilisers in order to treat the soil. Currently, because of the crisis, Shahlo's husband does not send home enough funds, thus her last hope rests only on receiving a loan. Shahlo really needs your support!

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora works hard to support her family. Teodora is married and has a livestock raising business in the Philippines.

Teodora requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Teodora has been in this business for 9 years.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Teodora would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Teresita is 31 years old and has three children who are in school.

Teresita has a general store business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries such as vinegar, soy sauce, coffee, eggs, breads, detergents, etc., to sell in her general store.

Teresita has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Narkul

texts.ru: Наркул успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В данный момент Наркул продолжает заниматься животноводством, у нее есть 2 коровы, 30 овец, 3 лошади. Ежемесячный доход Наркул составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). По характеру Наркул очень ответственная и доброжелательная. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) для приобретения 2 коров с телятами для увеличения поголовья скота. В будущем Наркул собирается и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота и хочет отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en:
Narkul has successfully repaid her loan, having using it as needed. She is thankful to Kiva and everyone who helped her with the financing. Currently, Narkul is still working in animal husbandry, and she has two cows, 30 sheep, and three horses. Narkul's monthly income is about 12,000 som (KGS). 

As a person, Narkul is very responsible and friendly. She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 som (KGS), in order to obtain two cows with calves, to increase her herd. In the future, Narkul intends to further increase her livestock headcount, and also wants to renovate her home.

loans.use: to purchase two cows with calves in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Claudia Azucena

texts.es:
Ella es Claudia una persona que con ganas, espíritu de progreso, monto un negocio de tienda de productos de la canasta familiar, usando una parte de su hogar, un negocio que a simple vista es hermoso y lo atiende una empresaria con un gran corazón y que deja todo en cada día de trabajo porque sabe que eso beneficia a su pequeña de tan solo 2 años de edad.

Como inicio su negocio hace poco tiempo, con un bajo capital tiene un surtido muy básico, es por ello, que desea solicitar un préstamo para la compra de abarrotes, granos, trigo, víveres y parte del préstamo lo destinara para pintar la fachada con la idea de hacerla más atractiva al público.
texts.en:
Claudia is a person who with enthusiasm and the spirit of progress, set up a business in the form of a store for products for the family food basket, using part of her home.  It’s easy to see that it’s a beautiful business, run by a big-hearted businesswoman.  She gives her best every working day because she knows that this benefits her little girl, who is only two years old. 

Because she started her business recently, and with little capital, her stock is very basic. That is why she wants to request a loan for the purchase of groceries, grains, wheat, and food supplies. Part of the loan is for painting the front, with the idea of making it more attractive to the public.

loans.use: to purchase a supply of products for the family food basket, and to paint the front of the business.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза честная и общительная женщина из района Бохтар. Ей 32 лет, она замужем и мать одного ребенка. Её муж, как и другие жители, уехал на заработки в Россию. Фируза сама очень трудолюбивая женщина. С помощью средств, который присылал муж, она смогла построить магазин для продажи продуктов питания. Магазин уже готов, однако, в данный момент из-за кризиса её муж не в  состоянии присылать ей деньги. Фируза видит единственный выход только в получении кредита. От суммы кредита она сможет купить продукты питания и начать свой маленький бизнес. Фируза верит, что благодаря вашей поддержке она сможет осуществить свою мечту.
texts.en:
Firuza is an honest and sociable woman from Bohtar region. She is 32 years old, married, and has one child. Her husband, like many other residents of her city, works in Russia. 

Firuza is a very hardworking woman. With the help of funds from her husband, she managed to build a shop for selling food products. The shop is already ready, however currently, because of the crisis, her husband cannot send her money. 

Firuza's only solution is to receive a loan. With the loan, she will be able to buy food products and start her small business. Firuza believes that thanks to your support, she will be able to realise her dream.

loans.use: to buy food products and start her new business.

loans.name: Elisa Group

texts.en:
Jocelyn is the featured borrower of the Elisa group. She went along with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, because they have always been friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines. They came to work in Lebanon for a better income to support their beloved ones back in the Philippines.

Jocelyn is a 38-year-old married mother of three children who is working hard as a housekeeper to cover the expenses and needs of her beloved kids and improve their living conditions. Thus, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees in the Philippines. Jocelyn is the first lady on the left of the photo.

With respect to the other group members, Merlinda is the first lady on the right, and Marilou is the lady standing in the middle.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees in the Philippines

loans.name: Stanley

texts.en: Stanley is 39 years old. He is married with five children. He sells bags for packing maize, a business he has done for 10 years now, and it has been profitable. He will be using this loan to purchase additional maize bags and hopes this will help him pay school fees for his children. His hopes and dreams for the future are to pay school fees and start a new business.

loans.use: to purchase additional maize bags to sell

loans.name: Turdubu

texts.ru: Турдубу, 55 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Турдубу с 2013 года занимается торговлей канцелярскими товарами и предметами одежды на рынке. В обороте есть товар на сумму 450,000 сом (KGS). Турдубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товара в обороте. Доходы от кредита Турдубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Turdubu is 55 years old, married, and has four children. She has secondary education. Since 2013, Turdubu's main source of income for her family has been selling office supplies and clothes at a market. She has 450,000 som (KGS) of products in circulation. 

Turdubu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) in order to augment the goods in circulation. Turdubu plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy stationery for retail sale in her shop.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is 49 years old and lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. She is a married woman and the mother of five children. 

Her husband is working, but earns a low income. Therefore, Iman thought that she should help her husband in the household expenses, and she start selling blankets at her home. 

Now she wants to expand her business because of the high standard of living costs. Therefore, she asked for a loan to buy a larger number of blankets to sell. She wants to increase her income to improve the standard of living for her children.

loans.use: to buy a larger number of blankets to sell

loans.name: Maira

texts.es:
Maira se dedica a la venta de mercancía en su papelería, productos que son muy bien acogidos por los habitantes del municipio de Sincelejo. Su constancia y empuje le han permitido forjarse una vida prospera.

Es casada y con gran satisfacción y amor por su trabajo, pues este le ha dado lo necesario para vivir.

Solicita un aliento económico el cual invertirá en la compra de mercancía como ropa, accesorios y útiles escolares para vender en su negocio.
 
Con este préstamo podrá sacar adelante su empresa y podría convertirse en una gran empresaria a futuro.
texts.en:
Maira works selling merchandise in her stationary shop, products which have been well accepted by the inhabitants of the municipality of Sincelejo. Her consistency and drive have allowed her to
create a prosperous life

She is married and gets great satisfaction and loves her work as this has provided her with what she needs to live.

She is requesting an economic boost that she will invest in buying merchandise like clothing, accessories and school supplies to sell in her business. With this loan she can make progress with her business and become a big entrepreneur in the future.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise like clothing, accessories and school supplies to sell in her business.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra is a 44-year-old married mother of two children. She started eight years ago planting vegetables to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. She is a hard worker and ambitious lady who has a good reputation among her customers. She succeeded throughout the years in gaining her own customers.

Today, Zahra is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary seeds and fertilizers to increase her production.

Zahra hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy necessary seeds and fertilizers to increase her production

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: На фотографии отец Умеджона. Умеджон добрый и отзывчивый мужчина. Ему 33 года. Он как глава семейства несет ответственность за членов семьи, за отца, жену и двоих детей. Сейчас отец Умеджона болен и он нуждается в реабилитации. Медицинские расходы большие и Умеджон много денег потратил на лечение отца. Сейчас нужно купить медикаменты и оплатить дальнейшее лечение, но денег у Умеджона закончились. Он обратился за кредитом, с надеждой, что ему здесь помогут. Поддержите Умедчона и его отца.
texts.en:
The man in the photograph is Umedjon's father. Umedjon is a kind and sympathetic man. He is 33 years old. As the head of his family, he has a responsibility for the his family members, and for his father, his wife, and two children. 

Now Umedjon's father is ill and requires rehabilitation. Medical expenses are very costly and Umedjon has spent a lot of money on his father's treatment. Now he needs to buy medicines and pay for further treatment, but Umedjon does not have any more money. He has applied for a loan, hoping that he will be helped here. Support Umedjon and his father!

loans.use: to pay for his father's treatment.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is a single woman, born in 1982, and has a secondary level of education. Marie started working in a clothing shop to help her family, but her limited salary is not enough anymore. Thus she is now requesting a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary furniture for her house. 

She is hoping that in the future, she will open her own clothing shop.

loans.use: to buy necessary furniture for her house

loans.name: Julliet

texts.en:
Julliet is a 47-year-old married mother of two children. She has worked for thirteen years in clearing transactions to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. She is a hard worker and a sacrificing mother who is depriving herself to give her children the best. She is trying desperately to improve her family's living conditions. Thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her son's university tuition fees. 

She hopes to open her own business in the future to increase her income and stay capable of providing her children with a descent life.

loans.use: to pay her son's univeristy tuition fees

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 30-year-old married man from Dier Al-Balah. He works as an employee with a low and unstable income. He also has a rickshaw which he uses for transporting eggs from the farmers to the local traders. This job provides him with a good income where he can cover part of the family's expenses. 

Mahmoud took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw to replace the old one. This will enable him to improve his business. 

Mahmoud appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw to replace the old one

loans.name: Omaira Estella

texts.es: Ella es Omaira es una mujer cabeza de familia que por sus propios méritos ha salido adelante y ha criado a dos hijos. Se dedica a atender un restaurante, ofrece platos típicos y desayunos deliciosos, es un lugar humilde pero muy aseado, la competencia en el sector, los altos costos de insumos la han hecho perder clientes, situación bastante delicada que la tiene recapacitando y buscando ideas para potenciar su negocio, pero en todas las que piensa necesita dinero con el cual no cuenta, es por esto, que quiere acudir a ustedes nobles personas a que apoyen a una mujer cabeza de familia que desea salir adelante, el dinero que se encuentra solicitando lo destinara mitad en compra de insumos en cantidades para disminuir gastos y realizar mejoras al local que tanto necesitan, pintar, comprar cartas, mesas, sillas entre otras.
texts.en: This is Omaira. She is the head of household who has gotten by on her own achievements and has raised two children. She has a restaurant where she offers traditional food and delicious breakfasts. It is humble but clean. Competition in the area and the high cost of supplies have made her lose clients, a delicate situation which has her reconsidering and searching for new ideas to improve her business. However, every idea she comes up with needs money she doesn’t have. This is why she wants to turn to you kind people who support a female head of household who wants to get ahead. Of the money she is asking for, half will be used to buy supplies in large quantities in order to lower costs and half to make much needed improvements to the restaurant, such as painting and buying menus, tables, and chairs, among other things.

loans.use: to buy supplies in large quantities in order to lower costs and to make much needed improvements to the restaurant, such as painting and buying menus, tables, and chairs, among other things.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana, es una mujer de cincuenta y dos años de edad, muy dinámica y trabajadora. Ella Día a día se pone metas de crecimiento como comerciante, posee una tienda en la cual oferta, ropa, zapatos y productos de belleza. En estos momentos, Ana ha recurrido a un préstamo, para invertirlo en su negocio, para comprar nuevos productos de belleza y otra mercadería que diversificaría de productos su tienda, lo cual la haría más atractiva para los clientes. En un futuro desea hacer de su tienda de variedades una boutique.
texts.en:
Ana is a fifty-two-year old woman, very dynamic and hardworking. She sets daily goals for growing as a businesswoman, and she has a store in which she sells clothing, shoes, and beauty products. 

Currently, Ana is requesting a loan to invest in her business by purchasing new beauty products and other merchandise that would diversify the products in her store, making it more attractive to the customers. 

In the future, she wants to turn her variety store into a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase new beauty products and other merchandise.

loans.name: Safargul

texts.ru:
Сафаргул та женщина, с которой можно пойти хоть на край света. Она всегда поддержит и не оставит близкого в беду. Сафаргул замужем. Ее муж разнорабочий. Он не имеет определенного места работы. Сафаргул практически сама вырастила шестерых детей. Она дома предоставляет услуги швеи. Сафаргул уже 7 лет как занимается этой деятельность. 
 Причина обращения Сафаргула за кредитом является приобретения стройматериала и ремонта дома. Ее дом нуждается в срочно ремонте. Ее дети маленькие и им жить в плохих условиях не рекомендуется. Сафаргул приобрела часть строительных материалов, но достаточного количества не хватает и она надеется на кредит.
texts.en:
Safargul is a woman with whom one can go anywhere with. She is always supportive and never deserts those close to her. Safargul is married. Her husband is an odd-job man. He does not have a specific place of work. Safargul practically raised her six children herself. She offers tailoring services from home. Safargul has been working in this business for seven years. 

Safargul applied for a loan in order to obtain construction materials and renovate her home. Her home needs urgent repairs. Her children are young and it is not advisable for them to live in poor living conditions. Safargul has purchased some construction materials, but it is not a sufficient amount and she is hoping for a loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and renovate her home.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 17 años, 14 años y 9 años de edad. Jorge trabaja como albañil desde hace mucho tiempo y este oficio le permite ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Para él lo más importante son sus hijos y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para darles mejores condiciones de vida es por ello que anteriormente solicito un crédito con el objetivo de incrementar el piso del corredor de la vivienda por lo que debida a la gran satisfacción de ver cumplida su meta él solicita este nuevo crédito a FUSAI para continuar con las mejoras de su vivienda las cuales le permitan brindar a su familia un hogar más digno. Por lo anterior con el monto solicitado comprara: cemento, arena, lamina, madera y grava para poder mejorar y ampliar la galera del área de pila para agua y lavadero ya que se encuentra en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Jorge is 37 years old and lives in his own house together with his three children aged 17, 14 and 9 years old. Jorge has worked as a bricklayer for a long time and this trade allows him to earn his living and support his household.

His children are the most important thing for him and he does everything possible to provide them with the best living conditions. For this reason he requested a previous loan with the objective to expand the veranda of the house.

Seeing his goal accomplished he is requesting a new loan from FUSAI to continue with the improvements on his house that have allowed him to provide his family with a more dignified house. For this reason he will buy cement, sand, laminate sheeting, wood and gravel with the amount requested to be able to improve and expand the shed over the waterstorage/wash basin area that is currently in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, laminate sheeting, wood and gravel to make improvements and expand the shed over the water storage/wash basin area.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 47 years old and has three children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Elizabeth is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Elizabeth has been raising livestock for six years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Elizabeth would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a married woman with five children all attending school. Together with her husband, they derive their sustenance and school fees for their children from the timber business. Due to the increased demand for timber having been brought about by the prevailing peace stability in the area, more people are now constructing permanent structures and thus need timber supplies.

In order to serve her clients better and catch up with the demand needs, Christine has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX.

She is particularly thankful for the support rendered by Kiva Lenders and Ugafode Microfinance Ltd.

loans.use: to boost stock by buying timber.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a divorced man aged 49 years old. He lives in a rural area with his seven children who are 21, 19, 17,15,13,11 and 9 years old and another two children who are orphans. Five of his children are still attending school. He runs a bar, and he supplements his family income with rentals. He works seven days a week and each day he works for 18 hours.

He started his business in 1993 with the aim of earning money, which can solve some of the problems at home. He has acquired this loan in order to restock his bar so that he can increase his sales.

His clients are fellow residents from his area, and his dream is to expand his bar but his biggest challenge is lack of enough capital.

He describes himself as a hard-working man. Photographed is Paul with the UGAFODE credit officer.

loans.use: To boost his bar business

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en: Abdu is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Makaranta Kinkiba Village. He joined Babban Gona to create a better life for his children. In the past, Abdu suffered from poor yields that crippled his ability to feed his family and children. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Abdu will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Abdu now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase farm yields.

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.ru: Гулдаста благодарна за поддержку. Она купила продукты для приготовления пирожков и самбусы. Гулдаста расширила ассортимент продукции. Она теперь не только продает мясные пирожки и мясные пироги, так же теперь она продает и сладкие угощения. Процесс работы также поменялся. Раньше она готовила на рабочем месте и продавала. Теперь она все готовит дома и вывозит на работу. Гулдасте один раз помогли, и она верит, что второй раз тоже поддержат. Гулдаста на этот раз тоже обращается за продуктами для приготовления самбусы, порожки, пироги и сладкие пирожные. Гулдаста ждет с надеждой.
texts.en:
Guldasta is thankful for the support. She has bought products for making pirozhkis and sambusas. Guldasta has expanded her product range. She does not sell only meat pirozhkis and meat pirogis, she now also sells sweet treats. Her work process has also changed. Before, she prepared and sold her goods at her workplace. Now she prepares everything at home, and transports it to work. 

Guldasta has been helped once, and she believes that she will be supported again. This time, Guldasta is also applying for a loan to buy products for making sambusas, piroshkis, pirogis and sweet pies. Guldasta is waiting hopefully.

loans.use: to obtain products for making pirozhkis, pirogis, and sweet pies.

loans.name: Olimpia Ana Deysi

texts.es:
Olimpia, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, por motivos de recursos económicos y el peligro de cruzar los ríos no siguió estudiando.- Actualmente está acompañada y tiene un hijo de 17 años de edad que estudia bachillerato.

Olimpia, trabaja vendiendo tortillas desde hace 4 años, fue por iniciativa propia que decidió colocar la tortillería, porque anteriormente se dedicaba a la elaboración de artesanía con tule.

Ella, necesita el préstamo para comprar maíz y una plancha para hacer las tortillas.

Olimpia, sueña con tener mejores ganancias y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Olimpia, age 41, studied until second grade. For economic reasons, and because of the danger involved in crossing the rivers, she did not continue studying.  Today, she lives with her partner and has a seventeen-year-old son who is studying in high school.

Olimpia has been working selling tortillas for four years. She decided to set up a tortilla stand on her own initiative, because previously, she used to work making handicrafts with reeds. 

She needs the loan to purchase corn and a griddle for making the tortillas. 

Olimpia dreams of having better earnings, and of improving her home.

loans.use: to purchase corn and a griddle to make tortillas.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom is 25 years old, single, and lives with his family at ChrPonhea Leu district, Cambodia.

Nowadays, Sarom is a student and has studied at the university in Phnom Penh, Cambodia in the field of electricity. He is in his third year, the first semester. He will graduate late in 2016.

He would like to apply for a loan to pay for his school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees.

loans.name: Haytham

texts.en:
Haytham is a 34-year-old married man from Khan Younis. He works as an employee with a low and unstable income. He also has a rickshaw which he uses for transporting goods for local traders. This job provides him with a good income which he uses to cover part of the family expenses.

Haytham took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw to replace the old one. This will enable him to improve his business.

Haytham appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw to replace his old one.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is aged 42 years old and married with eight children. She lives in Bundibugyo Uganda.

Grace trades in cocoa mainly, buying and selling to agents and cocoa companies alongside selling rice and fish in the markets. She started the business to raise income for the family and pay for school fees for the children. Grace's main challenge is limited capital. She is accessing credit to add capital in her business of rice and fish selling.

Grace hopes to expand the business, educate her children and support the family in getting their basic needs.

loans.use: to buy rice and fish for resale.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 28 years old. She is married with no children. She has had a motorcycle transport business for the last four years and earns an income of KES 25,000 a month.

She will be using the loan to purchase a motorcycle and hopes this will help her plough back into the business. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to run other businesses.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her business.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio, de 50 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela, porque creció solo con su madre y no tenían las condiciones necesarias para estudiar, está soltero y es padre de tres hijos, dos de ellos estudian y el mayor trabaja en un agro-servicio en la ciudad y es quien le apoya a él y a sus hermanos.

Florencio, se dedica a vender bebidas frías, pupusas y carne en las ferias que se desarrollan en las comunidades aledañas, trabaja desde hace 15 años; antes trabajo como ayudante en un trailer, descargando mercadería y cuando no hay ferias en los pueblos, se dedica al trabajo de jornalero y de ayudante de albañil.

Florencio, necesita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como bebidas frías, carne, entre otros y para comprar una plancha para hacer pupusa, pues en el pueblo donde reside se aproximan los días feriados y es de esa actividad de donde obtiene ingresos económicos.

Florencio, sueña con comprar dos tareas de tierra, para tener espacio donde realizar sus cultivos y además espera seguir apoyando a sus hijos en los estudios y hacerle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Florencio is 50 years old.  He did not have the opportunity to go to school as he was raised by a single mother who lacked the resources necessary for him to study.  He is single and the father of three children.  Two of them are in school, and the oldest works in an agricultural service center in the city, and helps both his father and his siblings.

Florencio makes his living selling cold drinks, pupusas (stuffed tortillas) and meat at the local community fairs.  He has worked at this for 15 years.  Before that he worked as a helper on a trailer, unloading merchandise.  When there aren't fairs in the towns, he works as a day laborer and a mason.

Florencio needs this loan to buy merchandise such as cold drinks and meat, among other things, and to buy a griddle to make pupusas.  In the village where he lives the festival days are approaching, and that is when he generates his income.

Florencio dreams of buying two plots of land to have space to raise his crops.  He also hopes to continue supporting his children in their studies and to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as cold drinks and meat, among other things, and to buy a griddle to make pupusas (stuffed tortillas).

loans.name: Phearom's Group

texts.en:
A 33-year-old mother, Phearom lives in Kampong Cham province. She has three dependent children to take care of. Two of her children are in school and the other one is below school age. To make a living, she sells coconuts and grows rice as the main sources of the family’s income. She sometimes harvests crops & produce for others for a fee. Her main challenge was earning a low income from her rice farming business which was threatened by drought.

Phearom decided to form a group of three members to apply for a new loan. This is her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The previous loan was completely repaid back and it was helpful to her as she was able to improve her lifestyle. The new loan, which she is applying for, will be used to buy rice seeds and organic fertilizers to enhance her rice farming business.

She hopes to earn more income so as to fulfill her dream of buying a new motorcycle for her daily commute and for business purposes.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and organic fertilizers to enhance her rice farming business.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more reams of paper, pens, and books to sell.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 41 years old. He is married with one child.

He has had an Mpesa shop business for 5 years and it has been profitable.

Philip has requested a loan from VisionFund Kenya which he will be using to add a new Mpesa float as well as sim credit cards for sale.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to pay school fees and start a new business.

loans.use: to add a new Mpesa float as well as sim credit cards for sale.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
Aracely con su gran voluntad y verdaderos deseos de salir adelante junto con su familia compuesta por su esposo y sus tres hijos, decidió emprender con un negocio de venta de mercancía como ropa, accesorios para vestir y cosméticos.  

Estos elementos intenta venderlos para obtener la manutención de su familia.
Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, juiciosa, organizada y muy simpática; valores que la han convertido en una vendedora muy reconocida.

Su anhelo es poder aumentar y hacer crecer su negocio, es por eso que solicita el apoyo de un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de ropa al por mayor, zapatos y accesorios.

De este modo podrá tener esa gran oportunidad de progresar.
texts.en:
Aracely has a strong will and true desire to succeed with her family, which consists of her husband and three children. She decided to start business selling merchandise such as clothing, clothing accessories and cosmetics. She wants to sell in order to support her family.

Aracely is an entrepreneur with vision, wise, organized and very friendly These values have helped her become popular.

Her desire is to enhance and grow her business. Aracely requests a loan to invest in buying wholesale clothing, shoes and accessories. This will help her obtain a great opportunity to progress.

loans.use: to invest in buying wholesale clothing, shoes and accessories.

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is a 30-year-old single lady living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She sells fish to the people around her town and has been in business for nine years.

She is a hardworking woman looking forward to expanding her business in spite of competition and limited capital to meet all her personal and business expectations. She is requesting a loan to buy more fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Gabriel Enrique

texts.es:
Gabriel es un hombre con 31 años de edad, padre de dos menores con 3 y 5 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, dedicado a la cría y posteriormente venta de ganado, una actividad que aprendió desde muy niño viendo a su madre realizarla. 
Con esto ha tenido un gran progreso, pues los ingresos que se obtienen de allí son utilizados para cubrir los gastos que se gastos de su hogar y las necesidades de sus pequeños.

Actualmente Gabriel o cuenta con mucho ganado, es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar el cual lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos y alimento para los mismos.

Con su ayuda este padre invertirá en un mejor futuro para su familia, Anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Gabriel is thirty-one years old and the father of two young children, ages three and five. He is hardworking and humble. He raises and sells livestock, an occupation that he learned as a very young boy, watching his mother carry out this work. 

He has made progress with this, as the earnings he obtains from it are used to cover his household expenses and his little ones’ necessities. 

Currently, Gabriel doesn’t have much livestock, and that is why he is requesting a loan with Interactuar.  He will invest it in the purchase of pigs and feed for them. With your help, this father will invest in a better future for his family. Please give him a loan.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed for them.

loans.name: Jose Marcelino

texts.es:
José, de 37 años de edad, no estudio porque sus padres no tenían muchos ingresos económicos, esta acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tienen un hijo de siete años de edad.

José, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace mucho tiempo y lo hace de lunes a sábado y su pareja es quien le ayuda en la venta. 

José, necesita el préstamo para mejorar su negocio y comprar más ropa, de esa forma logrará mejorar los ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia.

El sueño de José es, mejorar su negocio y administrarlo de la mejor manera para poder obtener más ingresos.
texts.en:
37-year-old José did not attend school because his parents didn't have much income. He is in a relationship, and his partner is a stay-at-home mom. They have a 7-year-old son.

For a long time now, José has made a living selling clothes. He does this Monday through Saturday, and his partner helps him with sales.

José needs the loan to improve his business and buy more clothing. In this way, he will succeed in improving his income in order to cover his family's needs.

José's dream is to improve his business and run it in the best way possible to earn more income.

loans.use: to improve his business and buy more clothing to sell

loans.name: Jovany Arley

texts.es:
Arley es un joven campesino con 19 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, dedicado a realizar labores de campo desde muy niño, una actividad que aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. Cuenta con variedad de cultivos de distintos productos como maracuyá, tomate y zanahoria.

Ha logrado un gran progreso, pues con el dinero que generan estos cultivos Arley paga sus estudios y aporta a los gastos de su casa. 
Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de abonos, fertilizantes, insecticidas y otros.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de comprarse una vivienda propia, brindarle a sus padres una buena estabilidad económica y mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Arley is a young farmer, at 19 years of age.  He is hard-working and humble, and has worked in field labor since he was very young.  He learned this activity thanks to his parents’ teachings.  He has a variety of crops of different products, such as passion fruit, tomatoes, and carrots.

Arley has achieved great progress, since he pays for his studies and contributes to household expenses with the money that his crops generate.

He is requesting a loan, which he will invest in the purchase of compost, fertilizer, insecticides, and more.

His dream is to keep working to fulfill his dream of buying his own home, and offering good economic stability and a better quality of life to his parents.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, insecticides, and more.

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a 46-year-old married mother of one child. Four years ago she started working as a teacher in an attempt to help her husband in covering the increasing needs of their child. Wafaa is a sacrificing mother and hard worker who is trying desperately to improve her family's living conditions.

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her child's university tuition fees. She hopes to stay capable of providing her only child with a decent life and a better future.

loans.use: to pay her child's university tuition fees

loans.name: Ra

texts.en:
A resident living in Kampong Cham province, Ra is 36 years old and a married mother of three children. One of them is in school, and one is too young to attend school. She has been growing rice and soybean for eighteen years as the main source of the family’s income. She occasionally works for others for a fee to provide better support for her family’s needs.

Having grown unhealthy and being destroyed by pests, the crop produced low outputs, and it became a challenge to her rice farming business. Ra decided to apply for a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). This will be her second cycle. The previous loan, which enabled her to improve her standard of living, was paid back successfully. She will use the new loan to support her soybean farming business by paying plowing and planting fees.

She hopes to improve her business so that she can get higher crop yields.

loans.use: to support her soybean farming business by paying for plowing and planting fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.en:
Tomasa is 62-years-old and has ten children. Tomasa is married with two children who are still in school.

Tomasa is in the agricultural business and raises pigs in the Philippines. Tomasa requested a PHP 50000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Tomasa has been raising pigs for 6 years and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Tomasa would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer con 35 años de edad, que ha logrado salir adelante ante la ausencia de su esposo quien la dejo hace poco, se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida, un negocio el cual inicio alrededor de 1 año, y del que depende dos hijos menores.

En su negocio hay una dificultad, el carro que utiliza Diana no es el indicado para realizar la preparación de comidas, es por esto que pide un auxilio económico con el fin de comprar o reformar el carro.

Para esta madre soltera no hay nada imposible, su meta es continuar trabajando para brindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y buena estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Diana is a 35-year-old woman who has managed to continue forward in the face of her husband's absence; not long ago, he left her. She works preparing and selling food, a business that she started about a year ago and which supports her two young children.

Her business faces an obstacle: the truck that Diana uses isn't appropriate for preparing food. For this reason, she is requesting a loan with the goal of buying a truck or modifying her current one.

Nothing is impossible for this single mother. Her goal is to continue working to provide her children a better quality of life and good economic stability.

loans.use: to buy a fast food truck

loans.name: Parveen's Group

texts.en:
Parveen is a 45-year-old lady living with her spouse and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She wants to save so that she can provide better living facilities to her children but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her husband has been driving a moto-rickshaw for several years but his income is insufficient to feed his entire family. He has to buy the motorbike and a rickshaw body but he does not have sufficient savings to buy a new moto-rickshaw.

Therefore, Parveen has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so her husband will be able to buy the motorbike and body to turn them into a moto-rickshaw. She hopes that she will be able to save enough to meet the sudden needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike and body to assemble into a moto-rickshaw for her husband's transportation services business.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 36-years-old and married with one school aged child. Since 2000, she has run a butcher shop selling cow and chicken meat. She is doing great and works from 7am to 8pm every day. Rose is able to make a good profit every month. 

With this loan, Rose is in her 22nd cycle with Tujijenge Tanzania. She has paid back all of her previous loans successfully and has used them to gain more. She has improved her business from only selling small cow meat to now selling both chicken and cow. She has also managed to put her child through school and pay everyday living expenses. Rose is really happy with Kiva's support. 

She is requesting another loan which she will use to buy cow and chicken meat to stock her shop for sale. Rose will be held accountable for paying back the loan per the set up schedule.

loans.use: to buy meat to stock in her butcher shop to sell.

loans.name: Margarita Rosa

texts.es:
Una mujer luchadora, trabajadora y llena de vida, así es Margarita, una señora con 56 años de edad, que a pesar de las dificultades por las que ha pasado nunca se ha rendido.
Desde hace poco monto su propio negocio, un criadero de aves, con esto ha logrado salir adelante ante la separación de su esposo quien la dejo hace ya un año.
Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de pollo de engorde, cerdos y alimento para los mismos.

Sus sueños son muchos, pero el principal es llegar a ver su casa bonita, ya que esta con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando y su estado no es el mejor.
texts.en:
Margarita is a diligent, hard-working woman who is full of life. She is 56 years old and, in spite of the difficulties she has faced, she has never given up.

A short time ago, she started her own business raising birds. With it, she has managed to continue forward after her separation from her husband, who left her one year ago.

She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of chickens to fatten, pigs, and food for the animals.

She has many dreams, but her main one is to eventually see her house be beautiful, because over time it has deteriorated and it is not in the best shape.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten, pigs, and food for the animals

loans.name: Shahenaz

texts.en: Shahenaz is a 54 year old married woman without child and lives in Irbid. Shahenaz is a responsible, welcoming and pleasant and works hard to help her husband with household expenses. She started her business selling blankets and has applied for a loan to improve her business by buying additional products and merchandise. With this she hopes to increase her income. Please help Shahenaz meet her goals, she hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy new blankets and products to sell to increase her income.

loans.name: Yahuza

texts.en: Yahuza is a Babban Gona maize farmer from the Mai Audiga Village. Yahuza joined Babban Gona to increase his income. Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Yahuza will have access to the best farm inputs in the market such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds; they will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags of maize.  This season, Yahuza has grand plans to harvest 60 bags. This will see him increase his household income considerably. Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Yahuza now has the opportunity to increase his yields and income and use his extra earnings to provide employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase his yields

loans.name: Cristina Janeth

texts.es:
Cristina es una señora de 30 años de edad, dedicada a la venta de mercancía, una actividad que inicio desde hace poco y de la cual depende un hijo de 6 años de edad.
Su deseo es formalizar su negocio, abrir su primer local y poder brindarle empleo a las personas que más lo necesiten.
En el momento tiene una cantidad de pedidos, pero no cuenta con buen capital de trabajo, es por esto que pide un auxilio económico el cual lo invertirá en la compra bisutería, ropa para dama, caballero y niño.
Espera que sus clientes la sigan buscando  por calidad, economía y buen servicio.

Para esta madre soltera no hay nada imposible, su meta es continuar trabajando, pagar la educación de su hijo y comprar su vivienda propia.

Con su aporte Cristina podrá cumplir sus sueños, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Cristina is a 30-year-old woman who sells merchandise, a business she started recently and which her six-year-old son depends on. 

Her wishes are to formalize her business, open her first shop and be able to provide jobs for people who most need it. 

She currently has a lot of orders but she doesn't have good working capital which is why she is requesting economic help which she will invest in buying costume jewelry and women's, men's and children's clothing. She hopes that her customers will continue to seek her out for the quality, economy and good service. 

For this single mother, nothing is impossible. Her goal is to continue working, to pay for the education of her son and to buy her own home. With your help Cristina will be able to fulfill her dreams. Go ahead, make a loan.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry and women's, men's, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is 44-years-old and has one son living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a general store which sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap biscuits and other items. He manages the household necessities from the store. He is a humble man and easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behavior, he has built up very good relationships with his customers. The general store is famous in town and is running very well. Because of his good relationships, his sales have increased a lot but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. Therefore, Naseem has requested a loan for her husband so that he is able to buy more wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, soap biscuits and more. Naseem would like to thank Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Senia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Senia, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en una alcaldia como ingeniero civil, juntos tienen una niña de siete años de edad que estudia primer grado.

Senia, hace cinco años se ha dedicado a vender productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña tienda que tiene en su casa, para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar; la tienda la abre de lunes a domingo.

Senia, solicita el préstamo para comprar más productos de la canasta básica como: arroz, azúcar, maíz y frijoles, de esa manera lograra mejorar su calidad de vida y ahorrar un poco para cualquier emergencia.

Senia, sueña con ver a su hija crecer y darle todo lo que ella necesita.
texts.en:
Senia is 27 years old and went to school until the sixth grade. She is in a relationship and her partner works at city hall as a civil engineer. Together they have a seven-year-old daughter who is in first grade. Senia has been selling food staples for five years in small store in her home to help her husband with the home expenses. She opens the store Monday through Sunday. 

Senia is requesting a loan to buy more food staples like rice, sugar, corn and beans in order to improve her quality of life and save a bit for any emergency. Senia dreams of seeing her daughter grow up and of giving her everything she needs.

loans.use: to buy more basic food staples like rice, sugar, corn and beans.

loans.name: Janet Johana

texts.es:
Janeth es una señora con 23 años de edad, dedicada a la cría de ganado, un negocio que inicio hace poco y del cual dependen dos hijos menores y su actual pareja.
Trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas diarias.

Actualmente Janeth no cuenta con mucho ganado, es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el fin de comprar más cerdos. Con esto espera aumentar sus clientes y de tal manera incrementar sus ganancias.

Desea seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño pagarle la educación a sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Como Janeth, miles de empresarios esperan de su ayuda, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Janet is a 23-year-old woman who raises livestock. She started her business recently and her two children and her partner depend on it. She works every day for five hours a day. 

Currently Janet doesn't have a lot of livestock which is why she is requesting a loan from Corporación Interactuar in order to buy more pigs. With this she hopes to increase her customers and thus increase her earnings. She wants to keep working to fulfill her dream of paying for her children's education and improving the conditions of her home. 

Like Janet, thousands of entrepreneurs are waiting for your help. Go ahead, make a loan.

loans.use: to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es una joven mujer de 19 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de topografía. 
Ella es inteligente, responsable, comprometida, constante, dulce, cariñosa, sensible y sincera. Sus estudios los realiza en un instituto técnico de excelencia en la localidad ‘Sacaba’, área rural beneficiada por la belleza natural del valle, posee características que cautivan por su clima y atractivos turísticos. Situada a13 kilómetros de la ciudad, a una altura que varía entre los 2600 y 4500 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Daniela es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado por detrás de la nuca, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por los estudios que realiza. Su vida la comparte junto a sus padres y hermanos mayores que trabajan independientemente, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe y paja con techo de calamina y piso de ladrillo que cuenta con los servicios de energía eléctrica, agua de pozo extraída mediante bomba y no existe el alcantarillado. Ella cursa la carrera de topografía y se encuentra en 1 año de 3 años que dura la carrera; disfruta ayudando a las personas, le estudiar los principios que tienen por objeto la representación gráfica de la superficie terrestre, su carácter es de servicio, “estudio topografía y trabajo medio tiempo ambas actividades ocupan toda mi jornada…” comenta. Paralelamente a sus estudio ella trabaja en un centro de fotocopiado medio tiempo. La ventaja de sus estudios es que no se cruzan con su trabajo, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de una computadora portátil. Su sueño concluir su carrera profesiona, ella desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios de forma satisfactoria. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que se dedica al estudio profesional. 
Es por esos motivos que Daniela solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil para continuar con sus estudios y terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Daniela is a young women, 19 years old, and single without children. She studies topography.

She is intelligent, responsible, committed, consistent, sweet, caring, sensible and sincere. She studies in a technical institute of excellence in the town Sacaba, a rural area that benefits from the natural beauty of the valley. It's captivating characteristics are its climate and tourist attractions. It is situated at 13 kilometers from the city, at an altitude that varies between 2,600 to 4,500 meters above sea level.

Daniela is dark-skinned, with brown eyes, long brown hair tied at the back of her neck, short stature, and a thin physique. Her maternal language is Quechua, which is spoken in the area, and she speaks Spanish for general conversation and her studies.
